class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/download_protection_service.cc;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=136<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/download_protection_service.cc;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=136"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/download_protection_service.cc;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=136<!----></a><br><br>## Fix<span class="line"><!---->## Fix<!----></span><br><br>An effective fix is to let `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase` and `DownloadRequestMaker` inherite the `WebContentsObserver` like this issue: <span class="line"><!---->An effective fix is to let `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase` and `DownloadRequestMaker` inherite the `WebContentsObserver` like this issue: <!----></span>https://crbug.com/1197904<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1197904" title="Security: UAF in NavigationPredictor"><!---->https://crbug.com/1197904<!----></a>.<span class="line"><!---->.<!----></span><br><br>## VERSION<span class="line"><!---->## VERSION<!----></span><br><br>Chrome Version: 98.0.4701.0 stable<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: 98.0.4701.0 stable<!----></span><br><br>## REPRODUCTION CASE<span class="line"><!---->## REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></span><br><br>1. Run `mkdir gen && mv copy_mojo_js_bindings.py gen`<span class="line"><!---->1. Run `mkdir gen &amp;&amp; mv copy_mojo_js_bindings.py gen`<!----></span><br>2. Run `cd gen && python copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chromium/gen`<span class="line"><!---->2. Run `cd gen &amp;&amp; python copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chromium/gen`<!----></span><br>2. Host `chooser.html` with a web server, like `python3 -m http.server 8887`<span class="line"><!---->2. Host `chooser.html` with a web server, like `python3 -m http.server 8887`<!----></span><br>3. Run `./chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --incognito <span class="line"><!---->3. Run `./chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --incognito <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8887/chooser.html`<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8887/chooser.html`"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8887/chooser.html`<!----></a><br>4. Click the "Trigger" Button. When a File Chooser Dialog is shown, click 'OK'<span class="line"><!---->4. Click the "Trigger" Button. When a File Chooser Dialog is shown, click 'OK'<!----></span><br><br>You may get 3 different ASAN logs.<span class="line"><!---->You may get 3 different ASAN logs.<!----></span><br><br>In `chooser.html`, I use `MojoJS` to reach the `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start`. But the MojoJS is not necessary since there is another way to reach there in **non-compromised** renderer. Check `download.html`.<span class="line"><!---->In `chooser.html`, I use `MojoJS` to reach the `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start`. But the MojoJS is not necessary since there is another way to reach there in **non-compromised** renderer. Check `download.html`.<!----></span><br><br>Both `CheckClientDownloadRequest` and `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` inherit from `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase`. The above cases use `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` but the `CheckClientDownloadRequest` can also reach these code without user interaction.<span class="line"><!---->Both `CheckClientDownloadRequest` and `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` inherit from `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase`. The above cases use `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` but the `CheckClientDownloadRequest` can also reach these code without user interaction.<!----></span><br><br>I have tried to reproduce it without `--enable-blink-features=MojoJS` but have not succeeded yet.<span class="line"><!---->I have tried to reproduce it without `--enable-blink-features=MojoJS` but have not succeeded yet.<!----></span><br><br>The `incognito` is not necessary but can make it easy to win the race. The attachment `crash-1-non-incognito.asan` shows the crash log without the `incognito` flag (See the `ALLOCATE` stack).<span class="line"><!---->The `incognito` is not necessary but can make it easy to win the race. The attachment `crash-1-non-incognito.asan` shows the crash log without the `incognito` flag (See the `ALLOCATE` stack).<!----></span><br><br>## FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<span class="line"><!---->## FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></span><br><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139"><!---->1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<!----></a><br>Author: Xinghui Lu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Xinghui Lu &lt;<!----></span>xinghuilu@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/xinghuilu@chromium.org"><!---->xinghuilu@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Fri Jan 14 01:35:00 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Fri Jan 14 01:35:00 2022<!----></span><br><br>Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<span class="line"><!---->Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<!----></span><br><br>Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<span class="line"><!---->Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<!----></span><br>browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<span class="line"><!---->browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<!----></span><br>destroyed, it will cause UAF.<span class="line"><!---->destroyed, it will cause UAF.<!----></span><br><br>In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<span class="line"><!---->will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<!----></span><br><br>A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<span class="line"><!---->A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<!----></span><br>service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<span class="line"><!---->service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<!----></span><br>fix will be addressed in a future CL.<span class="line"><!---->fix will be addressed in a future CL.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1284584<a class="strike-through" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168"><!---->524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<!----></a><br>Author: Xinghui Lu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Xinghui Lu &lt;<!----></span>xinghuilu@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/xinghuilu@chromium.org"><!---->xinghuilu@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Sat Jan 22 03:23:36 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Sat Jan 22 03:23:36 2022<!----></span><br><br>[M98] Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<span class="line"><!---->[M98] Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<!----></span><br><br>Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<span class="line"><!---->Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<!----></span><br>browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<span class="line"><!---->browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<!----></span><br>destroyed, it will cause UAF.<span class="line"><!---->destroyed, it will cause UAF.<!----></span><br><br>In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<span class="line"><!---->will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<!----></span><br><br>A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<span class="line"><!---->A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<!----></span><br>service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<span class="line"><!---->service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<!----></span><br>fix will be addressed in a future CL.<span class="line"><!---->fix will be addressed in a future CL.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span If the function is triggered after the profile is<span class="line"><!---->browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<!----></span><br>destroyed, it will cause UAF.<span class="line"><!---->destroyed, it will cause UAF.<!----></span><br><br>In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<span class="line"><!---->will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<!----></span><br><br>A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<span class="line"><!---->A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<!----></span><br>service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<span class="line"><!---->service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<!----></span><br>fix will be addressed in a future CL.<span class="line"><!---->fix will be addressed in a future CL.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span       ## VULNERABILITY DETAILS<span class="line"><!---->## VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></span><br><br>### Prolog<span class="line"><!---->### Prolog<!----></span><br><br>While closing a `FileSystemAccessFileWriter` (created from a non-sandboxed file system, eg. get from a file chooser dialog), `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start` will be invoked.<span class="line"><!---->While closing a `FileSystemAccessFileWriter` (created from a non-sandboxed file system, eg. get from a file chooser dialog), `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start` will be invoked.<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>interface FileSystemAccessFileWriter {<span class="line"><!---->interface FileSystemAccessFileWriter {<!----></span><br>  // ...<span class="line"><!---->  // ...<!----></span><br>  Close() => (FileSystemAccessError result);<span class="line"><!---->  Close() =&gt; (FileSystemAccessError result);<!----></span><br>  // ...<span class="line"><!---->  // ...<!----></span><br>};<span class="line"><!---->};<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/public/mojom/file_system_access/file_system_access_file_writer.mojom;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=30<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/public/mojom/file_system_access/file_system_access_file_writer.mojom;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=30"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/public/mojom/file_system_access/file_system_access_file_writer.mojom;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=30<!----></a><br><br>`CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start` will call `OnUrlAllowlistCheckDone`.<span class="line"><!---->`CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start` will call `OnUrlAllowlistCheckDone`.<!----></span><br><br>```C++<span class="line"><!---->```C++<!----></span><br>void CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start() {<span class="line"><!---->void CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start() {<!----></span><br>  // ...<span class="line"><!---->  // ...<!----></span><br><br>  // If allowlist check passes, FinishRequest() will be called to avoid<span class="line"><!---->  // If allowlist check passes, FinishRequest() will be called to avoid<!----></span><br>  // analyzing file. And `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnRequestBuilt` will be the callback for `DownloadRequestMaker::Start`.<span class="line"><!---->The `OnUrlAllowlistCheckDone` will try to analyze the file content according to the file type in `DownloadRequestMaker::Start`. And `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnRequestBuilt` will be the callback for `DownloadRequestMaker::Start`.<!----></span><br><br>```C++<span class="line"><!---->```C++<!----></span><br>void class="line"><!---->  download_request_maker_-&gt;Start(base::BindOnce(<!----></span><br>      &CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnRequestBuilt, GetWeakPtr()));<span class="line"><!----> got 3 ASAN logs while testing these code, their USE stacks are different but all of them were born from `DownloadRequestMaker::Start`.<span class="line"><!---->I got 3 ASAN logs while testing these code, their USE stacks are different but all of them were born from `DownloadRequestMaker::Start`.<!----></span><br><br>### Crash-00<span class="line"><!---->### Crash-00<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>==42813==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-use-after-free on address 0x61100018ff00 at pc 0x56540af6d64f bp 0x7ffec1515aa0 sp 0x7ffec1515a98<span 0x61100018ff00 thread T0 (chrome)<span class="line"><!---->READ of size 8 at 0x61100018ff00 thread T0 (chrome)<!----></span><br>    #0 0x56540af6d64e in network::(anonymous namespace)::SimpleURLLoaderImpl::FinishWithResult(int) services/network/public/cpp/simple_url_loader.cc:1525:18<!----></span><br>    #13 0x5597d3496832 in network::(anonymous namespace)::SimpleURLLoaderImpl::OnReceiveResponse(mojo::StructPtr<network::mojom::URLResponseHead>) services/network/public/cpp/simple_url_loader.cc<span class="line"><!---->    #13 0x5597d3496832 in network::(anonymous namespace)::SimpleURLLoaderImpl::OnReceiveResponse(mojo::StructPtr&lt;network::mojom::URLResponseHead&gt;) services/network/public/cpp/simple_url_loader.cc<!----></span><br>    ...<span class="line"><!---->    ...<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>In `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnRequestBuilt`, `SimpleURLLoader` will set `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnURLLoaderComplete` as the callback. Once the URLLoader is done, the callback will be invoked.<span class="line"><!---->In `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnRequestBuilt`, `SimpleURLLoader` will set `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnURLLoaderComplete` as the callback. Once the URLLoader is done, the callback will be invoked.<!----></span><br><br>```C++<span class="line"><!---->```C++<!----></span><br>void CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::SendRequest() {<span class="line"><!---->void CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::SendRequest() {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK_CURRENTLY_ON(BrowserThread::UI);<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK_CURRENTLY_ON(BrowserThread::UI);<!----></span><br>  // ...<span class="line"><!---->  // ...<!----></span><br>  loader_->DownloadToStringOfUnboundedSizeUntilCrashAndDie(<span class="line"><!---->  loader_-&gt;DownloadToStringOfUnboundedSizeUntilCrashAndDie(<!----></span><br>      service_->GetURLLoaderFactory(GetBrowserContext()).get(),<span class="line"><!---->      service_-&gt;GetURLLoaderFactory(GetBrowserContext()).get(),<!----></span><br>      base::BindOnce(&CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnURLLoaderComplete,<span class="line"><!---->      base::BindOnce(&amp;CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnURLLoaderComplete,<!----></span><br>                     GetWeakPtr()));<span class="line"><!---->                     GetWeakPtr()));<!----></span><br>  // ...<span class="line"><!---->  // ...<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>A call chain `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnURLLoaderComplete` => `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::FinishRequest` => `DownloadProtectionService::RequestFinished` => `MaybeLogSecuritySensitiveDownloadEvent` will be invoked.<span class="line"><!---->A call chain `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::OnURLLoaderComplete` =&gt; `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::FinishRequest` =&gt; `DownloadProtectionService::RequestFinished` =&gt; `MaybeLogSecuritySensitiveDownloadEvent` will be invoked.<!----></span><br><br>And a virtual function call to `BrowserContext` in `SafeBrowsingMetricsCollectorFactory::GetForProfile` leads to UAF.<span class="line"><!---->And a virtual function call to `BrowserContext` in `SafeBrowsingMetricsCollectorFactory::GetForProfile` leads to UAF.<!----></span><br><br>```C++<span class="line"><!---->```C++<!----></span><br>void MaybeLogSecuritySensitiveDownloadEvent(<span class="line"><!---->void MaybeLogSecuritySensitiveDownloadEvent(<!----></span><br>    content::BrowserContext* browser_context,<span class="line"><!---->    content::BrowserContext* browser_context,<!----></span><br>    DownloadCheckResult result) {<span class="line"><!---->    DownloadCheckResult result) {<!----></span><br>  if (browser_context) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (browser_context) {<!----></span><br>    SafeBrowsingMetricsCollector* metrics_collector =<span class="line"><!---->    SafeBrowsingMetricsCollector* metrics_collector =<!----></span><br>        SafeBrowsingMetricsCollectorFactory::GetForProfile(<span class="line"><!---->        SafeBrowsingMetricsCollectorFactory::GetForProfile(<!----></span><br>            Profile::FromBrowserContext(browser_context));<span class="line"><!---->            Profile::FromBrowserContext(browser_context));<!----></span><br>    if (metrics_collector && IsDownloadSecuritySensitive(result)) {<span class="line"><!---->    if (metrics_collector &amp;&amp; IsDownloadSecuritySensitive(result)) {<!----></span><br>      metrics_collector->AddSafeBrowsingEventToPref(<span class="line"><!---->      metrics_collector-&gt;AddSafeBrowsingEventToPref(<!----></span><br>          safe_browsing::SafeBrowsingMetricsCollector::EventType::<span class="line"><!---->          safe_browsing::SafeBrowsingMetricsCollector::EventType::<!----></span><br>              SECURITY_SENSITIVE_DOWNLOAD);<span class="line"><!---->              SECURITY_SENSITIVE_DOWNLOAD);<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/download_protection_service.cc;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=136<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/download_protection_service.cc;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=136"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:chrome/browser/safe_browsing/download_protection/download_protection_service.cc;drc=c7fa3ea1647b084f9aa790bf5be3a1ac58e3db78;l=136<!----></a><br><br>## Fix<span class="line"><!---->## Fix<!----></span><br><br>An effective fix is to let `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase` and `DownloadRequestMaker` inherite the `WebContentsObserver` like this issue: <span class="line"><!---->An effective fix is to let `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase` and `DownloadRequestMaker` inherite the `WebContentsObserver` like this issue: <!----></span>https://crbug.com/1197904<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1197904" title="Security: UAF in NavigationPredictor"><!---->https://crbug.com/1197904<!----></a>.<span class="line"><!---->.<!----></span><br><br>## VERSION<span class="line"><!---->## VERSION<!----></span><br><br>Chrome Version: 98.0.4701.0 stable<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: 98.0.4701.0 stable<!----></span><br><br>## REPRODUCTION CASE<span class="line"><!---->## REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></span><br><br>1. Run `mkdir gen && mv copy_mojo_js_bindings.py gen`<span class="line"><!---->1. Run `mkdir gen &amp;&amp; mv copy_mojo_js_bindings.py gen`<!----></span><br>2. Run `cd gen && python copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chromium/gen`<span class="line"><!---->2. Run `cd gen &amp;&amp; python copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chromium/gen`<!----></span><br>2. Host `chooser.html` with a web server, like `python3 -m http.server 8887`<span class="line"><!---->2. Host `chooser.html` with a web server, like `python3 -m http.server 8887`<!----></span><br>3. Run `./chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --incognito <span class="line"><!---->3. Run `./chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --incognito <!----></span>http://127.0.0.1:8887/chooser.html`<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://127.0.0.1:8887/chooser.html`"><!---->http://127.0.0.1:8887/chooser.html`<!----></a><br>4. Click the "Trigger" Button. When a File Chooser Dialog is shown, click 'OK'<span class="line"><!---->4. Click the "Trigger" Button. When a File Chooser Dialog is shown, click 'OK'<!----></span><br><br>You may get 3 different ASAN logs.<span class="line"><!---->You may get 3 different ASAN logs.<!----></span><br><br>In `chooser.html`, I use `MojoJS` to reach the `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start`. But the MojoJS is not necessary since there is another way to reach there in **non-compromised** renderer. Check `download.html`.<span class="line"><!---->In `chooser.html`, I use `MojoJS` to reach the `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase::Start`. But the MojoJS is not necessary since there is another way to reach there in **non-compromised** renderer. Check `download.html`.<!----></span><br><br>Both `CheckClientDownloadRequest` and `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` inherit from `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase`. The above cases use `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` but the `CheckClientDownloadRequest` can also reach these code without user interaction.<span class="line"><!---->Both `CheckClientDownloadRequest` and `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` inherit from `CheckClientDownloadRequestBase`. The above cases use `CheckFileSystemAccessWriteRequest` but the `CheckClientDownloadRequest` can also reach these code without user interaction.<!----></span><br><br>I have tried to reproduce it without `--enable-blink-features=MojoJS` but have not succeeded yet.<span class="line"><!---->I have tried to reproduce it without `--enable-blink-features=MojoJS` but have not succeeded yet.<!----></span><br><br>The `incognito` is not necessary but can make it easy to win the race. The attachment `crash-1-non-incognito.asan` shows the crash log without the `incognito` flag (See the `ALLOCATE` stack).<span class="line"><!---->The `incognito` is not necessary but can make it easy to win the race. The attachment `crash-1-non-incognito.asan` shows the crash log without the `incognito` flag (See the `ALLOCATE` stack).<!----></span><br><br>## FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<span class="line"><!---->## FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></span><br><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139"><!---->1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<!----></a><br>Author: Xinghui Lu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Xinghui Lu &lt;<!----></span>xinghuilu@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/xinghuilu@chromium.org"><!---->xinghuilu@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Fri Jan 14 01:35:00 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Fri Jan 14 01:35:00 2022<!----></span><br><br>Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<span class="line"><!---->Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<!----></span><br><br>Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<span class="line"><!---->Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<!----></span><br>browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<span class="line"><!---->browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<!----></span><br>destroyed, it will cause UAF.<span class="line"><!---->destroyed, it will cause UAF.<!----></span><br><br>In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<span class="line"><!---->will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<!----></span><br><br>A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<span class="line"><!---->A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<!----></span><br>service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<span class="line"><!---->service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<!----></span><br>fix will be addressed in a future CL.<span class="line"><!---->fix will be addressed in a future CL.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1284584<a class="strike-through" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168"><!---->524b01441d1acbca385df54d82720fccbd48f168<!----></a><br>Author: Xinghui Lu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Xinghui Lu &lt;<!----></span>xinghuilu@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/xinghuilu@chromium.org"><!---->xinghuilu@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Sat Jan 22 03:23:36 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Sat Jan 22 03:23:36 2022<!----></span><br><br>[M98] Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<span class="line"><!---->[M98] Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<!----></span><br><br>Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<span class="line"><!---->Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<!----></span><br>browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<span class="line"><!---->browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<!----></span><br>destroyed, it will cause UAF.<span class="line"><!---->destroyed, it will cause UAF.<!----></span><br><br>In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<span class="line"><!---->will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<!----></span><br><br>A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<span class="line"><!---->A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<!----></span><br>service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<span class="line"><!---->service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<!----></span><br>fix will be addressed in a future CL.<span class="line"><!---->fix will be addressed in a future CL.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139"><!---->1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1284584<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1284584" title="Security: UAF in safe_browsing::DownloadRequestMaker::Start"><!---->Bug: 1284584<!----></a><br>Change-Id: I540735a0ca522c98db34d4bb8c766601d4e41a8a<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I540735a0ca522c98db34d4bb8c766601d4e41a8a<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/3381677<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/3381677"><!---->https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/3381677<!----></a><br>Reviewed-by: Daniel Rubery <<span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-by: Daniel Rubery &lt;<!----></span>drubery@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/drubery@chromium.org"><!---->drubery@chromium.org<!----></a>><span         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/5491d2bacedc0eae10318b57675a1e98e230fb68<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/5491d2bacedc0eae10318b57675a1e98e230fb68"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/5491d2bacedc0eae10318b57675a1e98e230fb68<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>5491d2bacedc0eae10318b57675a1e98e230fb68<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/5491d2bacedc0eae10318b57675a1e98e230fb68"><!---->5491d2bacedc0eae10318b57675a1e98e230fb68<!----></a><br>Author: Xinghui Lu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Xinghui Lu &lt;<!----></span>xinghuilu@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/xinghuilu@chromium.org"><!---->xinghuilu@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Mon Feb 21 15:18:50 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Mon Feb 21 15:18:50 2022<!----></span><br><br>[M96-LTS] Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<span class="line"><!---->[M96-LTS] Remove pending download requests before the profile is destroyed.<!----></span><br><br>Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<span class="line"><!---->Currently, CheckClientDownloadRequestBase holds a raw pointer of<!----></span><br>browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<span class="line"><!---->browser_context. If the function is triggered after the profile is<!----></span><br>destroyed, it will cause UAF.<span class="line"><!---->destroyed, it will cause UAF.<!----></span><br><br>In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->In this CL, let SafeBrowsingService notify DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<span class="line"><!---->that the profile is going to be destroyed, and DownloadProtectionService<!----></span><br>will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<span class="line"><!---->will delete all pending requests that are associated with this profile.<!----></span><br><br>A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<span class="line"><!---->A long term fix would be making the DownloadProtectionService a keyed<!----></span><br>service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<span class="line"><!---->service and removing the pending requests directly during shutdown. This<!----></span><br>fix will be addressed in a future CL.<span class="line"><!---->fix will be addressed in a future CL.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>1d9300c6ec561931739e5e756a15b81c0e775139<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
